descriptor.name: Crimson Vanguard
descriptor.bio:
A military unit or organization that Captain Elena Rossi belongs to, currently reported as mobilized. txt ---
SIGNAL OVERRIDE:
PRIORITY LEVEL: 7
ZONE: 9
ENCRYPTION: AES-256
DATE: 2026-01-15

Subject: Operation Silver Talon - Asset Extraction

Local Asset "Viper" (identified as Captain Elena Rossi of the Crimson Vanguard) has completed the requisition of 12,000 Credits from the vault at Outpost Zeta.

descriptor.name: Outpost Zeta
descriptor.bio:
A location under siege with Black security level, where a vault containing credits was requisitioned. txt ---
SIGNAL OVERRIDE:
PRIORITY LEVEL: 7
ZONE: 9
ENCRYPTION: AES-256
DATE: 2026-01-15

Subject: Operation Silver Talon - Asset Extraction

Local Asset "Viper" (identified as Captain Elena Rossi of the Crimson Vanguard) has completed the requisition of 12,000 Credits from the vault at Outpost Zeta.

descriptor.name: High Command
descriptor.bio: A command authority that issued coded orders for the credit transfer operation. Rossi initiated the transfer following a coded order from High Command.

descriptor.name: Marcus Thorne
descriptor.bio: A senior lieutenant in the Iron Syndicate, identified as the logistics officer 'The Mule' who received the credits. " Logs identify this individual as Marcus Thorne, a Senior Lieutenant within the Iron Syndicate.

descriptor.name: Iron Syndicate
descriptor.bio: An organization that Marcus Thorne belongs to as a senior lieutenant. " Logs identify this individual as Marcus Thorne, a Senior Lieutenant within the Iron Syndicate.
